message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds $1500000 to us. Given its unparalleled features and capabilities, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $1250000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you place on your product,  $1250000 is significantly above my budget.  I'm interested in purchasing, but I'm only able to offer $800000 at this time. This is my maximum price point.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and uniqueness of our product, we believe it's worth more than what was initially proposed. Our revised offer for the product is $950000. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the true value of our product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $950000 is still out of my range.  As I mentioned before, $800000 is the absolute maximum I can offer for this product.  If we can't reach an agreement at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
We understand your constraints, Bob, and we're willing to compromise further. Our latest offer for the product is $900000. We hope this proposal allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
